page.title: 14Drawbacks and Improvements
page.content: Our survey showed most people enjoy living in a quiet country village. {The Drawbacks}were:_ {1.}No choice in shopping, they need to go to{Darlington},{Bishop { Auckland}or{Barnard Castle}. { 2.}Bus Service poor, so need a car. { 3.}More people having to travel out of the village for work. { Improvements}needed :- {1.}More shops eg.butchers or bakers { 2.}Better footpaths. {3.}A New Village Hall. {4.}A petrol station. {5.}The new houses are an improvement, they fill in the old stackyard and they improve trade and keep the school running.
